pos review: Breakfast was okay, location was fantastic.
The only plus was that it was close to the market square
neg review:
1. The rooms were not as seen in pictures .
2. The reception staff was not polite at all 
3. Very very small room
No kitchen towels, the fridge had a smell, no pots and pans for the kitchen stove and oven.

pos review: The location of the hotel was absolutely fantastic. No matter where we were going, we ended up running into it, as it was so central. The bed was wonderfully comfortable and our bed was actually a double and not two twins put together. We didn't have the breakfast, but there are plenty of places around for that. I must admit that I was a bit scared when I booked it because I saw some reviews mentioning that it was rather disappointing, but my experience was that it was a great choice.
neg review: There was a delay with the check-in process, but they provide a space for luggage which allowed us to walk around and discover the city while they got it sorted out.

Room smelled badly. Inclined wall right on top of the bed's head. No blinds on the window and the curtains were very thin so the sun went through. No sound isolation - could hear everything from the outside and hallways/other rooms.

pos review: Great location beside bars & restaurants & just off the main square. Effective blackout curtains.

neg review: I could hear the neighbours having sex, talking in the hallways. Different photos for each room would be a bonus.
